name: 陳貞光
objective: 本課程討論，化學中相關物理量的基本理論，技巧及應用等，特別是化學熱力學及電化學等。有關氣相，氣体定理，熱量，功，熱力學第一、第二及第三定律，焓，熵，自由能，相平衡，溶液，化學平衡，酸鹼，電化學，電極，電池，半反應等基礎理論之探討。
schedule:
w1- Course Description and Rules
w2- Introduction to Thermodynamics - Chap.1
w3- First Law of Thermodynamics - Chap.2
w4/5- Second Law of Thermodynamics - Chap.3
w6/7/8- Statistical Interpretation of Entropy - Chap.4
w9- Midterm Exam
w10/11- Auxiliary Functions - Chap.5
w12/13- Heat Capacity, Enthalpy, Entropy, and the 3rd Law - Chap.6
w14/15- Phase Equilibrium in One-component System - Chap.7
w16/17- Behavior of Gases - Chap.8
w18- Final Exam.
scorePolicy: 30% Midterm, 30% Final Exam, 30% Assignments, and 10% Class performance
materials:
Textbook: Introduction to the Thermodynamics of Materials, 5th Ed., by David R. Gaskell, Taylor & Francis, c.2008.
中文參考書：材料熱力學，編譯：蔡希杰，偉明圖書，c.2003.
原著：David R. Gaskell, 3rd Ed.
